data.name: Tatari
data.detailed_description:
Tatari is a first-person adventure game where you take the role of a detective assigned to a disappearance case.
As a police detective, you are sent to investigate from the last place the person of interest was seen. From there, you will find yourself experiencing some paranormal behavior that your logical mind can’t seem to get hold of.

You will follow the evidence to a village that has been abandoned for many years and holds many of the secrets and details for your case.
All the available places are filled with puzzles and locks that your goal is to open and get access to forgotten and hidden information that will bring you closer to finding an end to this case. Be careful, though. Some of the puzzles are more cunning than they seem and may cost you your life. Proceed with caution.
Tatari is based upon a traditional Japanese urban legend which you will experience to some extent.

data.short_description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
